parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.85

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Removes all event handlers of given type that were added by [[addEventHandler]] '''and''' resets event handler's creation index to 0.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> objectName [[removeAllEventHandlers]] handlerType

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> handlerType: [[String]] - see [[:Category:Event Handlers|Event Handlers]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[removeAllEventHandlers]] "Killed";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Event Handlers|EventHandlers list]], [[removeEventHandler]], [[addEventHandler]], [[removeMissionEventHandler]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96]]
